wikipedia_page.main:
John David Burnett (25 February 1840 – 18 June 1878) was an English first-class cricketer active 1882–90 who played for Surrey. He was born in Vauxhall and died in Pietermaritzburg. He appeared in five first-class matches. His brother was Ernest Burnett, who was also a first-class cricketer.
He was educated at Harrow School for whom he played cricket.
